rukus.text: 55|26|Chijo ni aru banbutsu wa shometsu suru.
55|27|Daga (eien ni) kawaranai mono wa, songen to eiyo ni michita anata no omo no jigandearu.
55|28|Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka.
55|29|Ten to ji no subete no mono wa, kare ni mukatte koi motomeru. Higoto ni kare wa,(aratana) miwaza de shori nasa reru.
55|30|Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka.
55|31|Anata gata (ningen to Jin no) 2tsu no shu yo, ware wa anata gata no tame, imani (Saigonoshinpan de anata gata no shobatsu ni) torikakarudearou.
55|32|Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka.
55|33|Jin to ningen no shu yo, moshi anata gataga, tenchi no ryoiki kara toku ni koe rarerunara, koete mi nasai. Ken'no ga nakute wa, koeru koto wa dekinai.
55|34|Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka.
55|35|Anata gata (jaakuna ryosha) ni taishite, moesakaru hono to kemuri ga abise rareyou. Anata gata ni wa, fusegi-yo ga naidearou.
55|36|Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka.
55|37|Ozora ga sakete, akagawa no yona bara-iro ni naru toki.
55|38|Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka.
55|39|Sonohi ningen mo Jin mo, sono tsumi ni tsuite wazawaza towa reru koto wanaidearou.
55|40|Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka.
55|41|Tsumi o okashita mono ni wa sono shirushi ga ari, kare-ra wa maegami to ashi o torae rareyou.
55|42|Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka.
55|43|Kore wa tsumi o okashita mono ga, usodearu to ii hatta jigokudearu.
55|44|Kare-ra wa sono (goka) to, nietatsu yu no ma o samayou.
55|45|Sorede anata gata wa,-nushi no onkei no dore o uso to iu no ka.
